item.title: Anthropic launches a Claude AI agent that lives in Chrome
item.description: Anthropic is the latest AI lab to offer an AI agent with the ability to view and take action in a user's Chrome browser.

item.title: Anthropic Settles High-Profile AI Copyright Lawsuit Brought by Book Authors
item.description: Anthropic faced the prospect of more than $1 trillion in damages, a sum that could have threatened the companyâ€™s survival if the case went to trial.

item.title: A Radiohead song from 1997 is on the Hot 100 charts, thanks to TikTok
item.description: "Let Down" broke into the Billboard Hot 100 nearly 30 years after its release, marking just the fourth Radiohead song to enter the charts.

item.title: The 39 Best Shows on Apple TV+ Right Now (September 2025)
item.description: Platonic, The Morning Show, and Chief of War are among the best shows on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: Anthropic settles AI book-training lawsuit with authors
item.description: Called Bartz v. Anthropic, the case deals with Anthropic's use of books as training material for its large language models.
